Title: ~Hack~ Sonic: Scorched Quest
RichPresencePatch:
Format:Value
FormatType=Value

Lookup:Zone
0x0000=🌴 Green Hill Zone (Act 1)
0x0001=🔥 Burning Hill Zone (Act 2)
0x0002=🔥 Burning Hill Zone (Act 3)
0x0003=🔥 Burning Hill Zone (Boss)
0x0200=🔥 Roasting Marble Zone (Act 1)
0x0201=🔥 Roasting Marble Zone (Act 2)
0x0202=🔥 Roasting Marble Zone (Act 3)
0x0203=🔥 Roasting Marble Zone (Boss)
0x0400=🔥 Flame Yard Zone (Act 1)
0x0401=🔥 Flame Yard Zone (Act 2)
0x0100=🔥 Boiling Labyrinth Zone (Act 1)
0x0101=🔥 Boiling Labyrinth Zone (Act 2)
0x0102=🔥 Boiling Labyrinth Zone (Act 3)
0x0103=🔥 Boiling Labyrinth Zone (Boss)
0x0300=🔥 Fire Light Zone (Act 1)
0x0301=🔥 Fire Light Zone (Act 2)
0x0500=🔥 Molten Brain Zone (Act 1)
0x0501=🔥 Molten Brain Zone (Act 2)
0x0700=✨ Special Stage 1
0x0701=✨ Special Stage 2
0x0702=✨ Special Stage 3
0x0703=✨ Special Stage 4
0x0800=✨ Special Stage 5
0x0801=✨ Special Stage 6

Lookup:SelectStage
0x00=Burning Hill 1
0x01=Burning Hill 2
0x02=Burning Hill 3
0x03=Burning Hill Boss
0x04=Roasting Marble 1
0x05=Roasting Marble 2
0x06=Roasting Marble 3
0x07=Roasting Marble Boss
0x08=Flame Yard 1
0x09=Flame Yard 2
0x0a=Flame Yard 3 [❌]
0x0b=Flame Yard Boss [❌]
0x0c=Boiling Labyrinth 1
0x0d=Boiling Labyrinth 2
0x0e=Boiling Labyrinth 3
0x0f=Boiling Labyrinth Boss
0x10=Fire Light 1
0x11=Fire Light 2
0x12=Fire Light 3 [❌]
0x13=Fire Light Boss [❌]
0x14=Molten Brain 1
0x15=Molten Brain 2
0x16=Molten Brain 3 [❌]
0x17=Cosmic Chase [❌]
0x18=Special Stage
0x19=Intro Sequence
0x1a=Sound Test

Lookup:Act
0x00=Act 1
0x01=Act 2
0x02=Act 3
0x03=Boss

Lookup:Lives
0x00=💙
0x01=❤️

Lookup:Super
0x00=
0x01=Burning 

Display:
?0xH00f633=Hff_0xH00ff82=H1a?Select Stage > @SelectStage(0xH00ff82) (@Value(0xH00ff84)) ~🎵
?0xH00f633=Hff_0x00f614=H0707?Select Stage > @SelectStage(0xH00ff82)
?0xH00fe25<=9_0xH00f7f5=1?@Super(0xHfe18)Sonic @Zone(0x00fe10) ⏰@Value(0xH00fe22):0@Value(0xH00fe25) @Lives(0xHfe18)x@Value(0xH00fe13) ⭕x@Value(0x00fe20)‍ 💎@Value(0xH00fe56)/6
?0xH00fe25>=Ha_0xH00f7f5=1?@Super(0xHfe18)Sonic @Zone(0x00fe10) ⏰@Value(0xH00fe22):@Value(0xH00fe25) @Lives(0xHfe18)x@Value(0xH00fe13) ⭕x@Value(0x00fe20)‍ 💎@Value(0xH00fe56)/6
Playing Sonic Scorched Quest 🔥

Achievements.Title: BUG LOG - Genesis Plus GX and Blastem
Achievements.Description: The 5th Special Stage is crashing the game when you touch any iron ball, cores recommended: PicoDrive or GearSystem.
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Megacrab
Achievements.Description: Defeat Megacrab in Green Hill Zone Act 1 without being hit.
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Gigatron
Achievements.Description: Defeat Gigatron in Burning Hill Zone Act 2 without being hit and super mode off. (Level Select Allowed)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Electrical Hazard
Achievements.Description: Defeat Metal Sonic in Burning Hill Zone Act 3 without being hit and super mode off. (Level Select Allowed)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Be careful of your head!
Achievements.Description: Defeat Dr. Robotnik in Burning Hill Zone without being hit. (Level Select Allowed)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Burning Hill Zone
Achievements.Description: Finish Green Hill and all Burning Hill acts.
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Mega Basaran
Achievements.Description: Defeat Mega Basaran in Roasting Marble Act 1 without being hit. (Level Select Allowed)

Achievements.Title: Golden Rings
Achievements.Description: Earn 1000 rings in one sitting, and without collecting with Sonic injured.
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: If I fail, I try again
Achievements.Description: Collect 3 continues.
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: You can beat me once but not ten
Achievements.Description: Have 10 lives.
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Kindness
Achievements.Description: Collect the blue emerald.

Achievements.Title: Burning like hell
